name: headbutt
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user sticks its head out and rams straight forward. It may make the foe flinch.
flavor_text.platinum: The user sticks its head out and rams straight forward. It may make the foe flinch.
